import {Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import React from 'react'; import Logout from './Logout'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; const UserBanner = ()=>{ const {isLoggedIn, userData} = useSelector(state =>({ isLoggedIn: state.user.isLoggedIn, userData: state.user.payload })) const loginButtons = () =>{ if(!isLoggedIn || userData == null){ return( ); } return(
); } return(
) } export default UserBanner;
